Name: Mund auf statt Klappe zu!
Source/Collection: Frauenbewegung in lauten Tönen Shout up with your song! CID I Fraen an Gender (Hg.) vielsprachige leichte bis mittelschwere Lieder aus der Internationalen Frauenbewegung
Notes: Deutscher Musikeditionspreis 2015 Best Edition in Germany 2015!
Related Works: BROT UND ROSEN by Martha Coleman
THE MARCH OF THE WOMEN by Ethel Smyth
LA LEGA, Bella Ciao by traditional Italy
Long Description: A collection of easy to medium songs in various languages from the international Women's Movement, featuring works by various composers and traditional songs.
Short Description: A collection of songs from the international Women's Movement for women's choir a cappella.
